items.title: Welcome to section 1F of the shop: Items.

Every 30 minutes, three new items are put on sale, but be quick! They have limited stock!

Use it with the `/use item {itemName}` command.
items.itemFlag_canOnlyCarryOne:
**There can be only one of this item in your inventory:**
So if you already have this item, you can't get another.
